title: When your ally be raging but they don't know you muted them 5 mins ago

replies.body:
When Laughing Fish posts another hilarious meme lol

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H46FRRvb-9o
That could very well be the greatest video I have ever seen.

It's hillarious to see your team flame you and rage you while you're running it down mid for them muting you. Then at the end of the game getting an instant feedback message telling you the jerk that flamed you and muted you got banned + took a loss because he was an asshole.

Moral of the story, don't be an ass. I've lost too many games because of people like this.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QYLfPGy0,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-01T01:44:24.514+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/vg5bAar.gif[/img]

how do you know if he's raging if you "muted" them 5 mins ago. "oh someone told me"... bullshit. You just stopped talking back so he could think you muted him like everyone else lol.
You can actually tell this by several things one of these: keeps ffing, flames in end game lobby, tries to add you to friend multiple times (you can troll him by ignoring even further).

> [{quoted}](name=ODiiiiiN,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QYLfPGy0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-01T16:56:22.153+0000)
>
> how do you know if he's raging if you "muted" them 5 mins ago.

Ping seizure.
Premade who didnt mute the guy is also an answer you know, common enough in league :P
Or if the teammates that weren’t muted respond to them so you know he’s still at it after you muted.

The best part most people don't know is.... when you mute someone... they can still see what you are saying, although you can't see what they are saying.

I mute anyone the first sign of someone being mean, and it's so funny when you see a teammate say "Stop fighting" or "Calm down" about 20 mins later... so you know they are still tilted, and saying "Really? That guys STILL pissed about that?"... really get's them even more pissed, so funny.
